sentences.en: A cooling drink is welcome on a hot day.
sentences.cn: 在热天清凉饮料很受欢迎.

sentences.en: Emergency cooling systems could fail and a reactor meltdown could occur.
sentences.cn: 紧急冷却系统有可能失灵，核反应堆有可能发生堆芯熔毁。

sentences.en: Fill the cooling system with antifreeze as a protection against frost.
sentences.cn: 在冷却系统里加防冻剂以防止霜冻.

sentences.en: His blood, by the logic of the time, needed cooling.
sentences.cn: 用当时的逻辑来说，他的血需要冷却一下。

sentences.en: I felt a current of cool air.
sentences.cn: 我感觉到了一阵凉风。

sentences.en: If you evaporate a little sea water on a porcelain dish ; on cooling, crystals of common salt will deposit on the sides of the dish.
sentences.cn: 如果你将少许海水放到瓷盘中蒸发,冷却后就会有普通食盐的结晶附着在盘的四周.

sentences.en: Imagine an environment that does not need cooling at all!
sentences.cn: 想像一下吧，这样的环境根本不需要冷却了！

sentences.en: Invert the cake onto a cooling rack.
sentences.cn: 把蛋糕倒扣在冷却架上。

sentences.en: It didn't come as a shock to learn that the fuel and cooling systems are the most common causes of breakdown.
sentences.cn: 燃油和冷却系统是造成故障的最常见的原因，这一点不奇怪。

sentences.en: It's cooling down a little. "
sentences.cn: 外面凉快一点了. ”

sentences.en: Large quantities of water are needed for cooling purpose.
sentences.cn: 冷却要用大量的水.

sentences.en: Mold temperature is controlled by water flow in cooling channels.
sentences.cn: 模具温度可用冷却槽中水的流动来控制.

sentences.en: She slopped around in the cooling water.
sentences.cn: 她在凉爽的水里走来走去.

sentences.en: The cooling system can, of course, freeze up in very cold weather.
sentences.cn: 冷却系统在很冷的天气, 当然可能冻结起来.

sentences.en: The cooling unit hasn't come on yet.
sentences.cn: 冷却装置还未工作.

sentences.en: The heat had to be dissipated by elaborate cooling systems.
sentences.cn: 热得用复杂的冷却装置散发.

sentences.en: The scholar foolishly took the school cooling pool for swimming pool.
sentences.cn: 学者愚蠢的把学校的冷却池当成游泳池。

sentences.en: The soothing, cooling effect is caused by the evaporation of the sweat on the skin.
sentences.cn: 这种放松而又凉爽的感觉是由于皮肤表面汗液的蒸发而产生的。

sentences.en: The water was slightly cooler than a child's bath.
sentences.cn: 这水比小孩子的洗澡水稍微凉一点。

sentences.en: Then you have, in terms of the barrier integrity, reactor cooling systems activity, cladding failure.
sentences.cn: 然后你们会有，在屏障完整性，反应堆冷却系统行为，覆盖层失效。

phrases.tran_cn: 冷却，降温；缓和运动；结束活动
冷却速度；冷却速率；散热速率

trans.tran_en: Something that is cool has a temperature which is low but not very low

trans.tran_cn: （使）变凉( cool的现在分词 )，（使）冷静
